definition.zh_def: 段落；一組連貫的句子，通常圍繞一個主題或思想。
definition.en_def: A distinct section of a piece of writing, usually dealing with a single theme or idea.
definition.example: The essay was divided into several paragraphs, each focusing on a different aspect of the topic.
